name: Frutti del Festival
desc: A brightly colored non-alcoholic beverage. Freshly squeezed Sunsettia and Wolfhook juices have been poured into a cup in a specific order. The cool and refreshing flavor and vibrant color remind people of the beautiful holiday times. Do not mess the order up if you want to get the gradient effect right!

value.text: Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 17% for 300s.

customize.name: Ricetta: Frutti del Festival
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fruits of the Festival.

customize.name: Bacca uncinata
customize.desc: Una bacca spinosa che spesso si impiglia nel pelo dei lupi. Osservandola, puoi quasi sentire le grida echeggianti dei lupi nei boschi.

customize.name: Tramontino
customize.desc: Un frutto carnoso, bello come il tramonto, che abbonda in tutta Teyvat. Dal sapore dolciastro e dall'elevato contenuto energetico.

customize.name: Zucchero
customize.desc: Un dolcificante derivato dai Fiordolci. Ha il potere di rallegrare e dare energia.

customize.name: Frutti del Festival delizioso
customize.desc: A brightly colored non-alcoholic beverage. The sublime enjoyment brought by the refreshing taste is almost like a sweet, illusory dream. One small sip transports you onto a white, sandy beach, where the sparkling seawater beats with the rhythm to which the hymn of your leisurely vacation shall be composed.

customize.name: Frutti del Festival sospetto
customize.desc: A brightly colored non-alcoholic beverage. The sourness of the Wolfhook has not been managed well, leading to a numbing sensation on your tongue. Wait a minute... Is that howling from Wolvendom you hear? That's got to be a hallucination, right? Right?
